```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
```


#load datasets
```{r}
#hyrdo and PPT and impervious
hydro<- read.csv("G:\\Shared drives\\2NDNATURE\\Science\\Research Projects\\TNC Urban Greeness Tracking\\Data\\Hydro_data\\hydro_metrics_study_614basins_mar5.csv") %>%
  select(!1,2,26)

green<- read.csv("G:\\Shared drives\\2NDNATURE\\Science\\Research Projects\\TNC Urban Greeness Tracking\\Data\\Analysis_ready_data\\Greenness_master_dataset_apr9.csv")


```

#join datasets
```{r}
master_dataset <- green %>% 
  left_join(hydro, by=c("Site_No_ID"="BasinID", "wat_yr")) %>%
  left_join(basins614, by=c("BasinID"="Site_No_ID")) %>%
  left_join(lc, by='BasinID') %>%
  filter(wat_yr>1984 & wat_yr<2020)
```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
write.csv(master_dataset, "G:\\Shared drives\\2NDNATURE\\Science\\Research Projects\\TNC Urban Greeness Tracking\\Data\\Analysis_ready_data\\master_dataset_mar5.csv")
```


#check areas
```{r}

master_dataset %>% ggplot(aes(wat_yr, Area_km2,col=BasinID)) + 
  geom_line()+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  ylim(0,10000)

```
